name: birthday_reminder
description: This is a Flutter app that it is used as a calendar for people birthdays. It sends you periodic notifications with future and current birthdays so you don't miss saying "Happy Birthday" to your firends/family/whatever.

scripts.build:docs: cd docs && npm run build && cd .. && npm run copy-files
scripts.build: npm run build:app_web && npm run build:docs && npm run copy-files
scripts.copy-files: npx -y copyfiles -u 2 -s docs/dist/**/* dist && npx -y copyfiles -u 2 -s build/web/**/* dist/app
